entry.title: Flash Flood Warning issued September 12 at 5:21PM MST until September 12 at 7:15PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 518 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain has moved out of the warned area. entry.summary: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 446 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain moved north of prior to 415 PM. Between 1 and 1.75 inches of rain fell over the area between Chloride and Golden Valley. entry.summary: ...The Wyoming Air Quality Division has issued an air quality alert for wildfire smoke in effect until 1 PM MDT Tuesday... The following message is transmitted in collaboration with the Wyoming Department of Environmental Quality, Air Quality Division, and the Wyoming Department of Health. * WHAT...Air Quality Alert for Wildfire Smoke.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston; Wyoming Black Hills

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued September 12 at 11:34AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MDT TUESDAY... The following message is transmitted on behalf of the Wyoming Department of Environmental Quality, Air Quality Division and the Wyoming Department of Health. WHAT...Air Quality Alert for Wildfire Smoke. WHERE...Much of southeast Wyoming. Some locations impacted include
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Goshen County; Laramie Valley; Niobrara County; North Laramie Range; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
